page.title: 04WORK
page.content: Most employed people are{farmers}but the Goonhilly Earth Station and the Culdrose Naval Base are important places of work though they are not in the D block . The people who work in the D block who are not farmers give some sort of service such as a shop keeping plumbing or gardening and work from home. 32% of the people work in the D block. More than 12% of the people work further 6km from the block. 50% of the people work less than 6km from the D block . .From our survey only 60% of the people were employed. {36%of the people were retired}and 4% of the people were unemployed .
